Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: 在游戏内查询FFlogs, 支持中国服. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: 在游戏内查询FFlogs, 支持中国服
Changelog:
- 2.0.8.0:
   Add party finder to open with feature.
- 2.0.8.1:
   Add ignore self option to open with and some smalls fixes.
